body_html: so i have split tf_core_kernels into 6 libraries, they compile fine, but after that tensorflow.pdb cannot be generated, because it gets above 3GB. So removing the pdb for now will work. I have discovered also that there is one script for version_info.cc, which is executed on every build and should be executed only once from a build machine. putting it in make,sh or something similar will be better.

body: so i have split tf_core_kernels  into 6 libraries, they compile fine, but after that tensorflow.pdb cannot be generated, because it gets above 3GB. So removing the pdb for now will work. I have discovered also that there is one script for version_info.cc, which is executed on every build and should be executed only once from a build machine. putting it in make,sh or something similar will be better.
